page.title: 08HEALTH & WELFARE, S CREAKE
page.content: The village has no resident doctor. Our nearest surgery is in Burnham Market, four miles away; whose doctors visit the surrounding area on a rota basis, three days a week. Renewal prescriptions are left at the Post Office, for collection and delivery of medicines by the visiting doctors. There are appointments and queueing systems at the Surgery, as well as baby, post and ante-natal clinics. No transport is available, except cars. An ambulance bus collects those needing treatment in the nearest hospitals at Kings Lynn, or Norwich. There is a local hospital car service, run by volunteers. The nearest dentists are in Fakenham, six miles away; where there is also a DHSS chiropodist. A mobile chiropodist visits S Creake, every two months.
